comments.body: Why is this no longer formatted as code? The previous behavior seemed sensible to me.
I guess it might be because it can now include links? In that case I think we should still have it in some monospace font.

Well, to add links in types (markdown doesn't let you mix code formatting with links), and to be a little closer to what the Rst renderer does. I think I'll defer worrying about font formatting to if/when we are trying to replace the Rst website.
